Package au.org.massive.oauth2_hpc.ssh

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SSHCertificateGenerator.SSHOptions
    Interface for SSHCertificateGenerator.SSHExtensions and SSHCertificateGenerator.SSHCriticalOptions
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KeyCodec
    Some utilities to encode/decode key pairs in PEM format using bouncycastle
    RSAPrivateKeyCodec
    Some utilities to encode/decode RSAPrivateKey into/from PEM format
    RSAPublicKeyCodec
    Some utilities to encode/decode RSAPublicKey into/from PEM format or ssh-keygen format
    SSHCertificateGenerator
    Signs ssh-rsa public keys and produces a certificate
    SSHCertificateGenerator.SSHOptionsComparator
    Comparator to facilitate lexical ordering required by the certificate specification
    SSHCertificateOptions
    Options for SSH certificate signing
    SSHCertificateOptions.Builder
    Builds the SSHCertificateOptions object
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SSHCertificateGenerator.SSHCertType
    Allowed certificate types
    SSHCertificateGenerator.SSHCriticalOptions
    Allowed SSH critical options
    SSHCertificateGenerator.SSHExtensions
    Allowed SSH extensions
